metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3757 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The print_maps function in toolbox/lsof.c in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-07-01 allows user-assisted attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application that attempts to list a long name of a memory-mapped file, aka internal bug 28175237.  NOTE: print_maps is not related to the Vic Abell lsof product.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
